bill.title: Cosmetology licensure law; make technical amendments to.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 73-7-7, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Remove Wigology And To Provide A Grandfather Provision For The Practice Of Wigology As It Existed Prior To July 1, 2013; To Amend Section 73-7-13, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Credit Hours Required For Barbers To Be Licensed In Cosmetology; To Amend Section 73-7-14, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Continuing Education Requirements For Initial And Renewal For Master Cosmetologist, Manicurist Or Esthetician Licenses; To Amend Section 73-7-16, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Clarify The Admission Requirements That Schools Of Cosmetology Must Follow On Admitting Students; To Amend Section 73-7-27, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Range Of Fines Imposed By The Board Of Cosmetology; To Amend Section 73-7-29, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Fees Assessed By The Board Of Cosmetology; To Amend Section 73-7-33, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Clarify Certain Sanitation Rules Governing A Home Salon; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Welfare
